DOC.brief_summary: VCU-ART3 double-blind randomize clinical trial anakinra high dose v anakinra standard dose vs placebo patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) measure effect acute rise fall plasma C reactive protein level first 14 day .
DOC.brief_title: Interleukin-1 ( IL-1 ) Blockade Acute Myocardial Infarction ( VCU-ART3 )
DOC.detailed_description: VCU-ART3 double-blind randomize clinical trial anakinra high dose v anakinra standard dose vs placebo patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) measure effect acute rise fall plasma C reactive protein level first 14 day
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : In order eligible study , patient must meet ALL 3 Inclusion criterion NONE Exclusion criterion . 1 . Acute STEMI define chest pain ( equivalent ) onset within 12 hour ECG evidence ST segment elevation ( > 1 mm ) 2 anatomically contiguous lead new presumably new 2 . Planned complete coronary angiogram potential intervention 3 . Age > 21 EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Inability give inform consent Pregnancy Preexisting congestive heart failure ( American Heart Association/American College Cardiology class CD , New York Heart Association IIIIV ) Preexisting severe leave ventricular dysfunction ( EF < 20 % ) Preexisting severe valvular heart disease Active infection ( acute chronic ) exclude Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) + undetectable RNA Recent ( < 14 day ) active use antiinflammatory drug ( include nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug [ NSAIDs ] corticosteroid use IV dye allergy ) Chronic inflammatory disease ( include limit rheumatoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematosus ) Active malignancy ( prior malignancy within past 10 year ) exclude carcinoma situ [ organ ] nonmelanoma skin cancer Anticipated need cardiac surgery Neutropenia ( absolute neutrophil count < 1,800/mm3 ) Need vaccination desensitization postpone 14 day
